description: Daria Tomenko decides to release Halden's secret intervention logs. She reviews and verifies the files, sharing them with trusted technologists to confirm authenticity.
After verification, Daria discreetly transmits the intervention logs and a technical summary to free zone leaders, urging public release despite fears of chaos.
The logs are published citywide, revealing years of secret BCI interventions that altered citizens’ lives. Public outrage follows, with massive calls for explanation and justice.
Council emergency session erupts in conflict. Innovators demand full transparency. Directorate pushes to suppress the leaks and reassert control. Harmonists are sidelined.
Street assemblies organize truth tribunals where victims share stories of BCI abuse. Petitions circulate to dismantle BCI, and the legitimacy of the Council faces unprecedented public challenge.
